trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE]To complete this procedure, you must have a Google account that has a verified email address.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE]To complete this procedure, you must have a Google account that has a verified email address.

trans-unit.source: To create a new Google account, go to accounts.google.com.
trans-unit.target: To create a new Google account, go to accounts.google.com.

trans-unit.source: Navigate to the Google Cloud Console website, sign-in with your Google account credentials, and then click **Create Project**.
trans-unit.target: Navigate to the Google Cloud Console website, sign-in with your Google account credentials, and then click **Create Project**.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE]When you already have an existing project, you are directed to the Projects page after login.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE]When you already have an existing project, you are directed to the Projects page after login.

trans-unit.source: To create a new project from the Dashboard, expand API Project, click Create... under Other projects, then enter a project name and click Create project.
trans-unit.target: To create a new project from the Dashboard, expand API Project, click Create... under Other projects, then enter a project name and click Create project.

trans-unit.source: Enter a project name, accept the terms of service, and click **Create**.
trans-unit.target: Enter a project name, accept the terms of service, and click **Create**.

trans-unit.source: If requested, carry out the SMS Verification, and click **Create** again.
trans-unit.target: If requested, carry out the SMS Verification, and click **Create** again.

trans-unit.source: Make a note of the project number in the **Projects** section.
trans-unit.target: Make a note of the project number in the **Projects** section.

trans-unit.source: Later in the tutorial you set this value as the PROJECT_ID variable in the client.
trans-unit.target: Later in the tutorial you set this value as the PROJECT_ID variable in the client.

trans-unit.source: In the left column, expand **APIs & auth**, click **APIs** then scroll down and click **Cloud Messaging for Android**.
trans-unit.target: In the left column, expand **APIs & auth**, click **APIs** then scroll down and click **Cloud Messaging for Android**.

trans-unit.source: Then on the next page click **Enable API** and accept the terms of service.
trans-unit.target: Then on the next page click **Enable API** and accept the terms of service.

trans-unit.source: Click **Credentials**, and then click **Create new Key**
trans-unit.target: Click **Credentials**, and then click **Create new Key**

trans-unit.source: In **Create a new key**, click **Server key**.
trans-unit.target: In **Create a new key**, click **Server key**.

trans-unit.source: Make a note of the **API KEY** value.
trans-unit.target: Make a note of the **API KEY** value.

trans-unit.source: You will use this API key value to enable Azure to authenticate with GCM and send push notifications on behalf of your app.
trans-unit.target: You will use this API key value to enable Azure to authenticate with GCM and send push notifications on behalf of your app.
